## ShadowRift
Explore and conquer a vast sci-fi universe with classic MMO gameplay in a vivid new setting. 
[Play Now](http://bluefroggaming.com/<https:/shadowrift.com>)
![Character_bg](http://bluefroggaming.com/assets/character_bg-a75303d463d82f858a9836e04b9b4d57.jpg)
Blue Frog Gaming is a small team of software craftsmen, pixel perfect artists, and game enthusiasts dedicated to building great games.
# Our Games
![Shadowrift_logo](http://bluefroggaming.com/assets/shadowrift_logo-052bd446ec3b7615446cce18ec640ac9.png)
Build fleets of advanced ships to conquer other players and mysterious Rift missions in a rich game world with as easy to user interface. 
[Play Game](http://bluefroggaming.com/<https:/shadowrift.com/>)
![Stardrift_logo](http://bluefroggaming.com/assets/stardrift_logo-ddd59567e44860af1f1b47d13b86f16b.png)
Built in collaboration with Syfy Games, Stardrift Empires takes the classic Starfleet Commander gameplay to a whole new level with expanded art, achievements, game mechanics, and of course new players to battle. Stardrift Empires Nova adds new ships and buildings to the game for a new experience. 
[Play Game](http://bluefroggaming.com/<http:/nova.stardriftempires.com/login>)
![Starfleet_logo](http://bluefroggaming.com/assets/starfleet_logo-41e5954f77f48ee636cf40ebc9ab7772.png)
The game that put us on the map, Starfleet Commander is a game of strategic dominance. This classic game of resource management, alliance building, and sneaky battles has multiple universes to play in, each with different rulesets and speeds to match your style of play. 
[Play Game](http://bluefroggaming.com/<http:/playstarfleet.com/>)
[![Hearts_logo](http://bluefroggaming.com/assets/hearts_logo-4794c8a7ec2cd411b5324c3aa8925883.png)](http://bluefroggaming.com/<https:/itunes.apple.com/mg/app/hearts-multiplayer-hd/id403673265?mt=8>)
[![Polar_puzzles_logo](http://bluefroggaming.com/assets/polar_puzzles_logo-135fe4e49aa0b27184190168d8ea1ab7.png)](http://bluefroggaming.com/<https:/itunes.apple.com/us/app/polar-puzzles-hd/id430894968>)

generated_description:
Blue Frog Gaming is a small but enthusiastic game development studio based in Akron, Ohio, operating with a tight-knit team of 11 dedicated employees. Founded during the Y Combinator Batch S07, Blue Frog specializes in creating rich gaming experiences that capture the imaginations of players.

Their flagship game, **ShadowRift**, invites players to explore a vast sci-fi universe, blending classic MMO gameplay with stunning graphics. In addition to ShadowRift, they offer a range of other engaging titles, including **Stardrift Empires**, developed in collaboration with Syfy Games, and **Starfleet Commander**, a classic strategy game that has garnered a loyal following. Each game is designed with an emphasis on user-friendly interfaces and captivating game mechanics, making them accessible and enjoyable for a wide range of players.

The company’s portfolio also includes a variety of archived games, ensuring that they have a rich history of diverse gaming experiences. Although details about their mission and market partnerships are not highlighted, their commitment to quality and innovation in game design is evident.

For more about their games and latest updates, you can visit their official website at [Blue Frog Gaming](http://bluefroggaming.com). They actively engage with the gaming community on social media platforms like Twitter, keeping players informed about their latest developments.

In essence, Blue Frog Gaming represents a blend of passionate craftsmanship and creative enthusiasm, working hard to create memorable gaming experiences in a competitive landscape. If you’re into engaging games filled with strategy and adventure, it’s worth checking out what this small but mighty team has to offer.
